ai-tha-ap258:1.2_0: But the Buddha became a Worthy One,
ai-tha-ap258:1.3_0: I’ve given a gift by myself.
ai-tha-ap258:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap258:2.4_0: as well as the Buddha’s head.
ai-tha-ap258:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Scripture.
ai-tha-ap258:5.1_0: he gave the sixth and the Elder Nun Sītaka Roja.
